name: Zombie Patrol PSP
description:
Made for 2020 PSP Halloween Game Jam!

A simple 2D top down shooter for the PSP.

If you're running the game on the PPSSPP emulator, please download the Zombie_Patrol_PPSSPP.zip file!

Controls:

L-Trigger/ R-Trigger
ShootAnalog Stick/D-Pad
Aim
SQUARELeftCIRCLERightTRIANGLEUpCROSSDownSTARTRestart

Credits:

ProgrammingstackstaArt assets
stackstaSoundTrackEgordorichev

Special Thanks to Iridescent, Egordorichev , PSP homebrew community and BK gang for helping me making this game :D

Install Instructions:

PSP

  • You will need CFW to play this.
  • Extract the Zombie_Patrol_PPSSPP.zip file inside PSP---> GAME  of your PSP.
  • Make sure that the EBOOT.PBP is inside of the same folder as the "assets" folder.

PPSSPP

  • Extract the Zombie_Patrol_PPSSPP.zip file and open the EBOOT.PBP with PPSSPP or drag it into the PPSSPP executable.
